title: • Behind American Horror Story: THEY ARE ALL REAL
author: American Horror Story 10
comment: Why am i so fascinated by crimes, serial killers, theories, weird shit and stuff.

You forgot Lana Winters. Her character was based off of Nellie Bly, a news reporter who in 1887 faked being insane so she could experience a mental institution. She wrote a book called '10 days in a madhouse' off of it. Her story is really really interesting actually.
I thought some of the characters were based off of real people but not this many and I fucking love it
There's even an old nursery rhyme about Borden: "Lizzie Borden took an ax, gave her mother 40 whacks. When he saw what she had done, she gave her father 41.
i think it's so cool how AHS draws in these true stories. it makes the show so much creepier
